Song.title: Immanuel
Song.copyright: Words and Music by Michael Card. © 1986 Birdwing Music (ASCAP) (a div. of EMI Christian Music Publishing) / Mole End Music

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: A s[Em]ign s[Em/D]hall be [D/C]giv–[C]en, a v[D]irgin will conc[Bm]eive [Bm7] A [Em]human [Em/D]ba- [D]by [D/C]bear–[C]ing [C/B]un–[G/B]dim–[G/A]in – [C/A]ished de- [G]i - [D]ty. The g[Em]lory [Em/D]of the [D/C]na - [C]tions, a l[D]ight for all to [Bm]see [Bm7] And [Em]hope for [Em/D]all w[D]ho [D/C]will [C]emb[C/B]race[G/B] his [G/A]warm [C/A]real–[G]i–t[D]y.
Chorus: [G]Im–[C/A]man-[D/B]–u–-[C]el, [D] our God is w[Bm7]ith us. [Em] [Em/D]And [G/D]if G[C]od [D/B]is [C/A]with [D]us [Bm]who could s[Bm4]tand ag[Em2]ainst [Em/D]us? Our [C]God [D/B]is with[C/A] us, Im[C/D]man–-[D]u–-[G]el.
Bridge: For [C]all t[C4]hose w[C]ho li[D]ve in the s[Bm7]had–-[Bm6]ow [Bm]of d[Em]eath A g[C]lor–[C4]i–o[C]us l[D]ight has d[Bm]awned. [Em2 Em/D] And for [C]all th[C4]ose w[C]ho st[D]umble in the d[Bm7]ark-n[Em]ess [Em/D] Beh[C]old, your [C/D]light h[D]as c[G]ome.
Chorus: [G]Im–[C/A]man-[D/B]–u–-[C]el, [D] our God is w[Bm7]ith us. [Em] [Em/D]And [G/D]if G[C]od [D/B]is [C/A]with [D]us [Bm]who could s[Bm4]tand ag[Em2]ainst [Em/D]us? Our [C]God [D/B]is with[C/A] us, Im[C/D]man–-[D]u–-[G]el.
Verse 2: So w[Em]hat will[Em/D] be your [D/C]answ[C]er, oh w[D]ill you hear the c[Bm]all [Bm7] Of h[Em]im who[Em/D] did [D]not s[D/C]pare h[C]is [C/B]Son, [G/B]but [G/A]gave [C/A]him for [G]us [D]all? On [Em]earth there[Em/D] is no [D/C]pow--[C]er, there [D]is no depth or h[Bm]eight [Bm7] That will e[Em]ver [Em/D]sep–-a[D]r–-[D/C]ate [C]us [C/B]from [G/B]the [G/A]love of [C/A]God [G]in Chr[D]ist.
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 a sign shall be given a virgin will conceive a human ba by bearing undimin ished de i ty the glory of the na tions a light for all to see and hope for all who will embrace his warm reality chorus immanuel our god is with us and if god is with us who could stand against us our god is with us immanuel bridge for all those who live in the shadow of death a glorious light has dawned and for all those who stumble in the darkness behold your light has come chorus immanuel our god is with us and if god is with us who could stand against us our god is with us immanuel verse 2 so what will be your answer oh will you hear the call of him who did not spare his son but gave him for us all on earth there is no power there is no depth or height that will ever separate us from the love of god in christ
